bio: The real effort can bring great results – so we often have special dishes. Boring recipes can make you sad, so always try to make some interesting cuisine. A single mistake in my kitchen can create a new dish!

ingredients: 300g/11oz pork tenderloin, trimmed of any fat
recipe.cookingMethod: The cooking utensils are a wok and wok spatula. Stir-frying is typically done on a gas stove, although an electric stove can be used if preheated to a high heat. Stir-frying typically uses a combination of meat or seafood, vegetables, and tofu. All ingredients are thinly sliced or cubed. The meat or seafood is marinated using soy sauce, salt, and other seasonings.

The cooking utensils are a wok and wok spatula. Stir-frying is typically done on a gas stove, although an electric stove can be used if preheated to a high heat. Stir-frying typically uses a combination of meat or seafood, vegetables, and tofu. All ingredients are thinly sliced or cubed. The meat or seafood is marinated using soy sauce, salt, and other seasonings.

ingredients: 3 tbsp. peanut or vegetable oil, divided
recipe.cookingMethod: The cooking utensils are a wok and wok spatula. Stir-frying is typically done on a gas stove, although an electric stove can be used if preheated to a high heat. The meat or seafood is marinated using soy sauce, salt, and other seasonings.
